name: HaxGAN
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING: MAY CONTAIN FLASHES ABOUT

Train a GAN (Generative Adversarial Network) provided to you by a mysterious individual to escape a futuristic prison in this first person stealth hacking game with a futuristic neon artstyle.
Destroy server security systems with a simple and straightforward gameplay loop while avoiding security drones that monitor the facility around you.

FEATURES
  • 4 levels
  • 5-20 minutes of gameplay
  • Art assistance by Midjourney AI
  • Coding and writing assistance by GitHub Copilot
  • Simple but effective glowy artstyle
  • Dark technological ambience and great sound effects
Made for WOWIE Jam 4.0. Theme: Collaborate with AI
